name: F R I E N D G U N
name_original: F R I E N D G U N
description:
Is the game running poorly in web? Please download the standalone below!

Hi all! This is my entry for Ludum Dare 43. I had some issues with mouse sensitivity. See if the [ESC] menu mouse sensitivity option helps you!

FRIENDGUN is a short (5-10 minute) game where you have a gun and many friends to put into it. What you do with that power is up to        y  o u.
